hero.title: Stacky Dash: Tile Adventure!
hero.subtitle: Collect, stack, and dash your way to victory in the most relaxing arcade challenge!

features: Simple swipe controls for all ages

controls: Collect as many tiles as possible
tips: Plan your path to maximize tile collection
Avoid dead ends and use bridges wisely
The more tiles you stack, the higher your score!

bridgeConstruction.title: Bridge Construction
bridgeConstruction.description: Stack tiles to build colorful bridges and reach new platforms. Each bridge is unique and requires strategy to complete!

reviews.text: So relaxing and fun! Love the bright colors and simple controls.
Perfect for quick breaks. The bridge mechanic is super satisfying!
My kids and I play together. No ads, no stress, just fun.

updates.title: New Levels Added!
updates.short: Explore 10 brand new levels with tricky bridges.
updates.full: We’ve just released 10 new levels! Each level features new bridge mechanics and colorful environments. Can you master them all?

updates.title: Performance Boost
updates.short: Game now runs smoother on all devices.
updates.full: Thanks to your feedback, we’ve optimized Stacky Dash for even smoother gameplay. Enjoy lightning-fast dashes and seamless stacking!

diaries.title: My First Mega Stack
diaries.short: How I stacked 100 tiles in one run.
diaries.full: I never thought I’d reach 100 tiles! Here’s how I planned my route and used every bridge to my advantage.

diaries.title: Bridge Mastery
diaries.short: Tips for building the perfect bridge.
diaries.full: After dozens of games, I’ve learned the secrets to bridge building. Here are my top tips for new players!
